document_data.name: Planar Dragon
document_data.mainbody: '''Planar dragons''' were true [[dragon]]s that were native to [[plane]]s other than the [[Prime Material plane]].
document_data.Abilities: Unlike most other true dragons, planar dragons were not natural spellcasters, lacking the affinity for sorcery that other species had. They did, however, have a variety of spell-like abilities.

Species.Innermost planes:
* [[Shadow dragon]]s and [[blight dragon]]s lived in the [[Shadowfell]].
* [[Faerie dragon]]s, [[mirage dragon]]s, and wretch dragons lived in the [[Feywild]].
Species.Transitive planes:
* [[Astral dragon]]s, kodragons, ectoplasmic dragons,<ref>{{Cite web/Psionic Bestiary: Ectoplasmic Dragon}} and pact dragons lived in the [[Astral Plane]].
* [[Ethereal dragon]]s lived in the [[Ethereal plane]].
